Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Chilichonse chili mlengalenga ndi padziko lapansi chimatamanda ndi kulemekeza Mulungu. Iye ndiye Mwini ufumu ndipo kwake ndi kuyamikidwa ndipo Iye ali ndi mphamvu pa chilichonse
Ndiye amene adakulengani inu ndipo ena a inu ndi osakhulupirira pamene ena ndi okhulupirira. Mulungu amaona zonse zimene mumachita
Iye adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi mwa chilungamo ndipo Iye adakulengani ndi kukupatsani maonekedwe abwino ndipo kwa Iye ndi kumene mudzabwerera
Iye amadziwa chilichonse chimene chili kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi ndipo amadziwa zonse zimene mumabisa ndi zimene mumaulula. Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa bwino lomwe zinsinsi za m’mitima mwanu
Kodi inu simudamve za iwo amene sadakhulupirire kale? Ndipo iwo adalawa chilango chifukwa chosakhulupilira, ndipo chawo chidzakhala chilango chowawa kwambiri

Ichi ndi chifukwa chakuti kunadza kwa iwo Atumwi amene adali ndi zizindikiro zooneka koma iwo adati: “Kodi ife tizitsogozedwa ndi anthu anzathu?” Kotero iwo sanakhulupilire ndipo anabwerera m’mbuyo. Koma Mulungu sasowa kanthu. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi Mwini wa chilichonse ndi Mwini ulemerero wonse. Al Taghabun

Anthu osakhulupirira amaganiza kuti sadzaukitsidwa kwa akufa. Nena: “Inde! Pali Ambuye wanga! Inu, ndithudi, mudzaukitsidwa kwa akufa ndipo mudzauzidwa zimene mudachita. Zimenezo ndi za pafupi ndi Mulungu.”
Motero khulupirirani mwa Mulungu ndi mwa Mtumwi wake ndi mu Muuni umene Ife tatumiza. Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa chilichonse chimene mumachita

Patsiku limene Iye adzakusonkhanitsani inu nonse, tsiku losonkhana, tsiku limeneli lidzakhala tsiku la mavuto ndi la mtendere kwa ena a inu. Ndipo iwo amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, Iye adzawakhululukira machimo awo ndipo adzawaika m’minda imene imathiriridwa ndi mitsinje yoyenda madzi pansi pake kuti akhale m’menemo mpaka kalekale. Kumeneko ndiko kupambana kwenikweni
Koma iwo amene sakhulupirira ndipo amakana ulangizi wathu, iwo adzakhala ku moto nthawi zonse omwe ndi malo oipitsitsa kukhalako
